title: Is educational attainment associated with lifetime risk of cardiovascular disease?

title_detail.value: Is educational attainment associated with lifetime risk of cardiovascular disease?

summary: Men and women with the lowest education level had higher lifetime risks of cardiovascular disease than those with the highest education level, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Men and women with the lowest education level had higher lifetime risks of cardiovascular disease than those with the highest education level, according to a new study.
